A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Its not all bad but plotholes\, a jumpy narrative and  sense of bleakness run throughout the film. Although It is a movie about failure\, I still  found it somewhat  disrespectful to the existing characters with unusually timed humour sometimes undercutting dramatic moments. There are some wonderful parts in this movie but it feels uneven. Its a shame real critique has been overshadowed by nasty underserved comments and a greater shame that fine actors have been harassed on social media. The actors are all fantastic throughout and I believe if the last movie addresses the end of the story well this episode will be loved a lot more by fans of the franchise
